New Records: Tarik Skubal became the fourth Detroit left-hander with 200 strikeouts in a season
Key Match Events: The Tigers took the lead with two runs in the second inning
Pre-Game Insights: The game was a celebration of the Tigers' 1984 World Series championship
Post-Match Reflections: Alex Cora said Tarik Skubal should probably win the Cy Young
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tyler Holton pitched the ninth for his sixth save
Others: The Tigers moved within 1 1/2 games of Boston for fourth in the American League wild-card race
